fields.name: Usage: /settings show
fields.value: This command lists out the server settings.

fields.name: Usage: /settings inactive <days>
fields.value: This command sets how many **days** of inactivity a user needs to be before inactive roles are given to them. Set it to 0 to disable.

fields.name: Usage: /settings userlog
fields.value: This command opens a select menu to select which channels to notify when a user join or leaves the server.

fields.name: Usage: /settings msglog
fields.value: This command opens a select menu to select which channels to notify when message outside of the chosen channels is deleted.
